snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 409: Tails to the Rescue (SAGE2003)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Tails to the Rescue - SAGE2003
Credit: Sonique Hedgehog (TKgames)
Release Date: September 8th, 2003

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

(Demo 1)
00:00 - Logo
00:11 - Title
01:02 - Green Hill Act 1
07:38 - Green Hill Act 2
12:21 - End Screen Tails
13:05 - Space Chase Act 1
20:02 - Cutscene
20:57 - Space Chase Act 2
26:03 - End Screen
26:38 - Secret Area
27:23 - Green Hill & Boss (EngineTest)

(Demo 2)
32:27 - Intro&Stuff
33:01 - Title
33:17 - Dark Woods Act 1
36:41 - Green Beach Act 1
40:08 - Detour Special Stage
44:22 - Not so Hidden Palace Act 1

NOTES: So now we take a look at an old game by TKgames's old member Sonique.
Sonic appears to have been captured by Eggman and Tails has to go out and rescue him.
Makes sense right? But then you see the game and be like huh... Don't make much sense.
Well this game had about 10 different story itterations.
The last one would be Eggman can bring life to star constellations and control them to defeat Tails and friends.
Much more context on the story is available my site.
Now as for the game well, the engine is very rough, the control and physics are not exactly easy to play with.
collision detections can also make you have glitchy interactions with walls and floors.
Demo 2 is probably the superior version of the 3 available here.
Game also contains a new antagonist whos shadowy figure we only see once.
Music variety is there as well, that Epoch midi tho... Makes me wanna go play more Epoch.
Overall the game was planned to be big but it never quite made it that far.

(ISSUES)

1. Sonic can fall off the stage in his second act and get softlocked.
